hints.label: lem-drift-condition-corrected
hints.title: Drift Condition with Quadratic Lyapunov
hints.content:
1065: :label: lem-drift-condition-corrected
1066: 
1067: Under Assumptions A1 (confinement) and A3 (friction), there exist constants $a, b, c > 0$ such that the quadratic Lyapunov function:
1068: 
1069: $$
1070: V(x,v) = a|x|^2 + 2b x \cdot v + c|v|^2
1071: $$
1072: 
1073: satisfies a drift condition with respect to the **adjoint operator** $\mathcal{L}^*$:
1074: 
1075: $$
1076: \mathcal{L}^*[V] \le -\beta V + C
1077: $$
hints.raw_directive:
1062: Moreover, the simple Lyapunov $V = |x|^2 + |v|^2$ does NOT satisfy a drift condition due to the cross-term $x \cdot v$. We need a **quadratic form** that handles this coupling.
1063: 
1064: :::{prf:lemma} Drift Condition with Quadratic Lyapunov
1065: :label: lem-drift-condition-corrected
1066: 
1067: Under Assumptions A1 (confinement) and A3 (friction), there exist constants $a, b, c > 0$ such that the quadratic Lyapunov function:
1068: 
1069: $$
1070: V(x,v) = a|x|^2 + 2b x \cdot v + c|v|^2
1071: $$
1072: 
1073: satisfies a drift condition with respect to the **adjoint operator** $\mathcal{L}^*$:
1074: 
1075: $$
1076: \mathcal{L}^*[V] \le -\beta V + C
1077: $$

hints.title: Exponential Tails for QSD
hints.content:
1227: :label: thm-exponential-tails
1228: 
1229: Under Assumptions A1-A4, the QSD $\rho_\infty$ satisfies:
1230: 
1231: $$
1232: \rho_\infty(x,v) \le C e^{-\alpha(|x|^2 + |v|^2)}
1233: $$
1234: 
1235: for some constants $\alpha, C > 0$ depending on $\gamma$, $\sigma^2$, $\kappa_{\text{conf}}$, and $\kappa_{\max}$.
